segments.text: You would be using mainly English in this job . Do you think you can make yourself understood in English with ease ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I speak English quite fluently . I've often explained historical places in Xi'an to foreign tourists in English . They say my English is quite good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many years have you been learning English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , more than ten years . I started learning English when I was still in a primary school from a foreign teacher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , perhaps that's the reason why you are so fluent in it .
segments.speaker: S1
